name: MOOD (Modern Opus Of Demon-hunting) - ALPHA
description:
UPDATE: I forgot to reference the Everything In Context blog from which I cribbed the battle system. So I'm giving them a shout-out right here and I updated the credits to link the blog as well!

----

Welcome to MOOD (Modern Opus Of Demon-hunting), ALPHA version!

MOOD is a text-based homage to first-person demon-murderizing shooters of yore. It is, right now, completely playable, but incomplete. You should hopefully not run into any dead-ends (if you do, let me know!). You might get to shoot a gun! At a monster! Maybe!?

This is my first game, and my first Game Jam, and I'm extremely grateful for the Goblin Bunker gang for the experience, support and encouragement.

Also big ups to ID Software, Carmack, Romero, etc, for the inspiration for this LEGALLY DISTINCT TEXT ADVENTURE. Also also, cheers Tim Rogers for your fantastic review of DOOM.
